title: Analyze Zustand store persistence issues on mobile/Android
description: Comprehensive analysis of Zustand store persistence and Firestore synchronization to identify potential issues on mobile/Android platforms
close_reason: Analysis complete - identified 5 critical persistence issues and 3 mobile-specific problems. Key issues: race conditions in auto-sync, timestamp handling inconsistencies, missing error recovery, Android background sync limitations, and local storage persistence gaps.
